title: Ugly mindset': UP minister clarifies cheque pic with soldier's grieving mother.
selftext: Uttar Pradesh Minister Yogendra Upadhyay was slammed by the Opposition after a video of him posing for the cameras while handing over a cheque to Captain Shubham Gupta's family in Agra, went viral on Friday.
